prefsPopupExplanation.message: Activating the toolbar button or shortcut key will FIXME in a pop-up. If you have the sidebar open, FIXME shown there too.

prefsSidebarExplanation.message: FIXME in the sidebar, which can be opened via the toolbar button or shortcut key.

hintSidebarIsNotPrimary.message: EXTENSION_NAME is set up to use a pop-up. The sidebar will still work, but using the shortcut key will make the pop-up appear, not the sidebar.
